title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, silver gilt strips on silk thread
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Large ogival pattern formed by long scalloped leaves in profile on curving stems, in silver gilt twill, centered on purple cut velvet panel.  Delicate symmetrically twining stems, leaves and flowers in red satin provide the supplementary pattern.
name: Textile
